column1: Kata Robata////I would just like to say I had an amazing experience my server was Thai he was so attentive he made the experience 10 times better he needs a raise honestly because on top of the food being good quality and good his service put it over the top and I will be returning because he is awesome like me and my friend left and we were speechless because it was that good it was our first time being there and he made it a very memorable experience
